name: Monster Production
description:
Monster Production is my Ludum Dare entry this year it's a simple little game you play as a monster scaring people in the middle of the night. You are on the job though so you still get coffee breaks and lunch breaks.

The original version is 1.0.0.0.exe all versions after are after the deadline.

Keys are real simple

Move -- Arrow Keys

Scare ---Spacebar key
